page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: IN THE COMMONSIDE DISTRICT DANCES ARE HELD OCCASIONALLY AT THE TEVIOTDALE LODGE HOTEL.CEILIDHS WITH SINGING AND DANCING TO SCOTTISH MUSIC ARE ALSO HELD THERE.THE CHILDREN AROUND COMMONSIDE DISTRICT ARE ENTERTAINED ANNUALLY WITH A CHRISTMAS PARTY.A GROUP OF LOCAL MOTHERS FORM A COMMITTEE TO RAISE FUNDS AND ORGANISE THIS PARTY WHICH IS HELD IN TEVIOTHEAD VILLAGE HALL.A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF'HOME' ENTERTAINING IS DONE WHEN FRIENDS INVITE ONE ANOTHER TO A DRINK AND A MEAL AND TO ENJOY AN EVENING IN ONE ANOTHER'S COMPANY.
